original_text: When I have brought them back from the nations and have gathered them from the countries of their enemies, I will be proved holy through them in the sight of many nations.
korean_text: 내가 그들을 만민 중에서 돌아오게 하고 적국 중에서 모아 내어 많은 민족이 보는 데에서 그들로 말미암아 나의 거룩함을 나타낼 때라

sentences.original_text: When I have brought them back from the nations
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들을 열국에서 돌아오게 할 때에

sentences.original_text: and have gathered them from the countries of their enemies
I will be proved holy through them
in the sight of many nations
